/** 
 * Tests  {@link Code93Writer}.
 */
public final class Code93WriterTestCase extends Assert {
  @Test public void testEncode() throws WriterException {
    doTest("ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789","000001010111101101010001101001001101000101100101001100100101100010101011010001011001" + "001011000101001101001000110101010110001010011001010001101001011001000101101101101001" + "101100101101011001101001101100101101100110101011011001011001101001101101001110101000"+ "101001010010001010001001010000101001010001001001001001000101010100001000100101000010"+ "10100111010101000010101011110100000");
  }
  private static void doTest(  String input,  CharSequence expected) throws WriterException {
    BitMatrix result=new Code93Writer().encode(input,BarcodeFormat.CODE_93,0,0);
    assertEquals(expected,BitMatrixTestCase.matrixToString(result));
  }
}
